FuncDef:
The dhcpv6 unicast-option command configures the unicast option on the DHCPv6 server. Then, the DHCPv6 server can receive unicast DHCPv6 messages and instruct the DHCPv6 clients to communicate with the DHCPv6 server in unicast mode.
The undo dhcpv6 unicast-option command restores the default setting.
By default, the unicast option is not configured on the DHCPv6 server.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The dhcpv6 unicast-option command is required when the DHCPv6 server needs to communicate with DHCPv6 clients in unicast mode.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
